title: Ep 327: KMI, Oil Stocks, Best Analysts to Follow and FCU
itunes:title: KMI, Oil Stocks, Best Analysts to Follow and FCU
description:
We start today with a question from Alan who’s a long-time subscriber. He wants to know about Kinder Morgan, Inc. (KMI). 
Josh wrote in to ask Frank if he’s buying any oil stocks during this recent pull back.
John would like Frank’s recommend as a go to guy when things go bullish and another list of those to listen to when we’re in a bearish market.
Ken writes in to comment on Frank’s recent analysis of Fission Uranium Corp.
 
 to learn more, and don’t forget send in your questions
